entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog at times overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
